sub_title: Avocat - Registered in France, Luxembourg and The Netherlands
summary:
PROFILE

BANKING & FINANCE. – Banking & finance lawyer specialised in capital-market  and more particularly in structured and derivative products, with more than 20 years’ experience as senior legal counsel with major international investment banks such as ABN-AMRO London and Société Générale Paris.

IN HOUSE STYLE LEGAL SERVICES AND TRANSACTIONAL PRACTICE. – In private practice since 2010, providing as an external lawyer, In House Style Legal Services to financial and non-financial institutions such as NIBC and PGGM,  as well as transactional legal services to various Dutch and international clients.

PRACTICE AREAS. - Banking & Finance; Corporate Finance; Derivatives (OTC and cleared); EMTN; Fund raising; Managed Accounts; Out-of -Court Settlements; Security Finance; Securitisation & Asset Based Finance; Structured Products and Finance; Trust & Fiduciary Advisory Services.

ADMISSIONS. - Avocat (Barreau de Vannes, France) - Advocaat (Utrechtse Orde van Advocaten).

INTERNATIONAL SECURITISED/STRUCTURED FINANCE REAL ESTATE TRANSACTIONS 

Acted for a UK FCA regulated Arranger of several securitised/structured finance real estate transactions in London and Paris for various international investors.

LEGAL CONSULTANCY IN THE NETHERLANDS

NIBC BANK. – Emir, Rated Securitisation and Capital Adequacy transactions. - 6 months on site assignment. Acted as Legal Consultant for the Financial Market Team of NIBC’s legal department on the above projects.

PGGM. – Managed Account Hedge Fund Platform and Infrastructure transactions. 18 months on site assignment. Acted as Legal Consultant for PGGM, a major Dutch pension fund, within its legal department on the above projects.

DUTCH CUSTOMER RECEIVABLE SECURITISATION TRANSACTION

CROSS- BORDER PRIVATE EQUITY TRANSACTION

Funding of an Anglo-Swiss family office by private equity investors based in Canada and in the UK.
